_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PTERODACTYL PANEL - PTERODACTYL.IO
name: IW4Admin

installation.script:
echo "Installing IW4X Admin" 
apt -y update
dpkg --add-architecture i386
apt -y install curl wget unzip
export HOME=/mnt/server
wget -P /mnt/server/ https://github.com/RaidMax/IW4M-Admin/releases/download/2023.06.10.2-prerelease/IW4MAdmin-2023.06.10.2.zip
cd /mnt/server && unzip -o IW4MAdmin-2023.06.10.2.zip
cd /mnt/server && rm IW4MAdmin-2023.06.10.2.zip
